body: Family are away for us to instantly belong when we treat them with respect.
Relationships take work. When we all take on the responsibility of maintaining it that work load becomes easier to handle for everyone.

If you don't think you have enough money in this world, chances are you still have alot of wealth. You just need to open your eyes and see what is right in front of you. Money only matters because we THINK it does. There are so many more important things for to strive for.

Chances are the person at work you find hard to deal with, thinks the same about you. The only way to combat that is to have an outside conversation and see if you have common ground. Once you stop seeing them as a thorn in your side and start seeing them as an individual with differences. Your work life will become a little less complicated.
Family are away for us to instantly belong when we treat them with respect.
